UniprotID	Q96RI0

EntryName	PAR4_HUMAN
ProteinName	Proteinase-activated receptor 4 (PAR-4) (Coagulation factor II receptor-like 3) (Thrombin receptor-like 3)
GeneName	F2RL3 PAR4
Length	385
Function	Receptor for activated thrombin or trypsin coupled to G proteins that stimulate phosphoinositide hydrolysis (PubMed:10079109). May play a role in platelets activation (PubMed:10079109).
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane
